text: Boxes with pandoc-latex-environment and awesomebox 2020-01-01 Boxes with pandoc-latex-environment and awesomebox This example demonstrates the use of the filter pandoc-latex-environments to create custom boxes with the awe somebox package. pandoc-latex-environment is a pandoc filter for adding LaTeX environement on specific HTML div tags. Box Types For a list of all available boxes and options visit the awesomebox documentation. ::: note Lorem ipsum dolor ... 0 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
